name: 2D Shooter (arch1s)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project.

Modifications:

1) Reworked existing levels and added a third level.

2) The last level has new mechanic - Boss Fight

3) Added new mode - Endless Mode (you have only one live and have to stay alive as long as possible)

4) Added comets that will fly through the level and can kill the player

5) All sounds have been replaced with new ones

Credits:

Created by Arthur Borysov
